Posts.EditableText: textadventures.co.uk now has an RSS feed: http://www.textadventures.co.uk/feed.php Add this to your blog reader and stay informed of the latest games that have been uploaded to the site. Google Reader is pretty good - no need to download any software, and there's an "Add to Google" button at http://www.textadventures.co.uk. And since you can play text adventure games online, you can stay up to date with the latest Quest games wherever you are. Any comments or suggestions please let me know.
Posts.HTML:
textadventures.co.uk now has an RSS feed: http://www.textadventures.co.uk/feed.php

Add this to your blog reader and stay informed of the latest games that have been uploaded to the site.

Google Reader is pretty good - no need to download any software, and there's an "Add to Google" button at http://www.textadventures.co.uk. And since you can play text adventure games online, you can stay up to date with the latest Quest games wherever you are.

Any comments or suggestions please let me know.

Posts.EditableText: I've now added a feed for reviews and comments: http://www.textadventures.co.uk/feed-reviews.php
